abstract: There was a lot of talk about tablets in 2009 as magazines and newspapers worked on various concepts for content. Next year we may get one.
snippet: There was a lot of talk about tablets in 2009 as magazines and newspapers worked on various concepts for content. Next year we may get one.
lead_paragraph: Publishers made 2009 the year of the concept newspaper and magazine. Time Inc. teamed up with a design company, the Wonder Factory, to create a fun concept video of the Sports Illustrated of the future. Then there was another concept video from the Bonnier Group, a Swedish media company, which went a step further and moved the words and images off a screen and onto a table, allowing you to flick, drag and scroll in thin air.
